content.question: A historian researching the effects of Christian missionariesâ€™ activities on local social structures in late-nineteenth-century Africa would probably find which of the following sources most useful?

choices.label: African accounts of converting to Christianity
Fundraising speeches given in Europe by supporters of missionary efforts
Data on the number of missionaries going to Africa
Recruitment advertisements for missionaries in church newsletters in Europe

content.answer: African accounts of converting to Christianity

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
